name: coding-contest-monitor
description: Monitor coding activity during programming contests - tracks typing patterns, paste events, file operations, and window focus for fair play enforcement.

codingContestMonitor.serverUrl.description: Server URL for uploading monitoring events (e.g. https://your-server.com). Can also be set via CONTEST_MONITOR_SERVER_URL environment variable.

codingContestMonitor.uploadInterval.description: Interval in seconds between event uploads to the server.

codingContestMonitor.batchSize.description: Maximum number of events per upload batch.

codingContestMonitor.pasteThreshold.description: Minimum character count to flag a paste event as suspicious.

codingContestMonitor.unfocusedAlertSecon.description: Seconds of unfocused window time before triggering an alert.

codingContestMonitor.autoStart.description: Automatically start monitoring when VS Code opens.

codingContestMonitor.enableStatusBar.description: Show monitoring status in the status bar.
